title: H3-X
summary: The H3-X is a fully automatic laser rifle commonly used in and by the Foralkan Military. It can be obtained by reaching Tier 2 of Foralkan standing and being purchased from a Foralkan military station. Its model is that of the HEX Splitter by ROBLOX.
full_text:
H3-X
The H3-X is a fully automatic laser rifle commonly used in and by the Foralkan Military. It can be obtained by reaching Tier 2 of Foralkan standing and being purchased from a Foralkan military station. Its model is that of the HEX Splitter by ROBLOX.
Weapon Stats
Damage Per Second
56.6
Damage Per Shot
10
Rate of Fire
340
Laser Speed
450
Laser Color
Red
